courses.title: Data Curation & Preparation for AI
courses.subtitle: Ensuring high-quality data for AI success
courses.description: Covers essential techniques for data preparation, including cleaning, labeling, augmentation, and pipeline development for machine learning workflows.
learning_outcomes: Apply preprocessing and data cleaning techniques
Design data pipelines for scalable ML training
Evaluate and enhance data quality through labeling and augmentation

courses.title: AI Data Structures & Big Data
courses.subtitle: Efficient data handling for scalable AI
courses.description: Focuses on structured and unstructured data management, indexing methods, vector databases, and big data frameworks relevant to AI development.
learning_outcomes: Understand and implement advanced data structures in AI systems
Utilize vector and graph databases for efficient information retrieval
Integrate Delta Lake for scalable and reliable data storage

courses.title: Data Science & Analytics
courses.subtitle: Extracting insights from data using AI tools
courses.description: Covers practical data science workflows using Python, SQL, and popular visualization tools for deriving insights and building business intelligence dashboards.
learning_outcomes: Query and manipulate data using SQL and Python
Visualize data with Power BI and Tableau
Apply data analytics methods to real-world problems

courses.title: Model Evaluation & Optimization
courses.subtitle: Improving AI model performance
courses.description: This course explores strategies for evaluating model performance and applying optimization techniques like cross-validation, hyperparameter tuning, and benchmarking.
learning_outcomes: Perform model validation and diagnostic analysis
Optimize hyperparameters using grid search and Optuna
Benchmark and compare model performance across datasets

courses.title: Transfer Learning & Fine-Tuning Techniques
courses.subtitle: Leveraging pre-trained models for rapid AI development
courses.description: Students learn how to use pre-trained AI models (BERT, LLaMA, Mistral) and fine-tune them for custom tasks in NLP, vision, and classification applications.
learning_outcomes: Use pre-trained models effectively in AI systems
Apply fine-tuning strategies to customize model behavior
Evaluate and validate fine-tuned models in practice

courses.title: AI in Web Development
courses.subtitle: Embedding AI in modern web architectures
courses.description: Explore how to integrate AI into web applications, from frontend components to backend services, including APIs and microservices.
learning_outcomes: Understand the architecture of AI-enabled web applications
Implement AI models in frontend and backend systems
Develop and deploy intelligent APIs

courses.title: AI for Quality Assurance & Testing
courses.subtitle: Boosting QA with AI-driven testing tools
courses.description: Learn how AI can support software testing, including unit tests, E2E testing, and automated code review.
learning_outcomes: Use AI tools to generate and optimize test cases
Conduct AI-assisted unit and E2E testing
Analyze and improve code quality with AI

courses.title: Prompt Engineering & LLM Orchestration
courses.subtitle: Designing efficient prompt chains and AI agents
courses.description: Hands-on training to build prompt pipelines, design interactions, and orchestrate LLM behavior using tools like LangChain and CrewAI.
learning_outcomes: Design and test effective prompts
Chain prompts and workflows using orchestration frameworks
Implement agent-based reasoning logic

courses.title: Building Autonomous AI Agents
courses.subtitle: From single prompts to self-governing AI workflows
courses.description: Project-based course to design and deploy AI agents that plan, store memory, and solve tasks autonomously using agentic frameworks.
learning_outcomes: Build autonomous agent pipelines using LangGraph
Define memory and role strategies for agent interaction
Deploy agents for specific use cases such as research or coding

courses.title: LLM Application Development
courses.subtitle: Full-stack development with modern LLM tools
courses.description: Develop and deploy applications that utilize LLMs at scale. Work with platforms like Hugging Face, OpenAI, LangSmith, and GPT-4o.
learning_outcomes: Build scalable applications using LLMs
Integrate and deploy models using cloud platforms
Monitor, test, and optimize LLM-based applications

courses.title: Ethics, Law & AI Society
courses.subtitle: Regulatory and ethical foundations for AI systems
courses.description: Explores ethical challenges, regulatory frameworks, and legal considerations in AI development and deployment.
learning_outcomes: Evaluate ethical implications of AI decision-making
Understand global data privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA
Apply governance models and compliance policies in AI systems

courses.title: AI for Image & Video Generation
courses.subtitle: Creative generation using generative models and AI tools
courses.description: Explore the principles and tools behind image and video generation using AI models such as DALL·E, MidJourney, and Stable Diffusion.
learning_outcomes: Understand the architecture and operation of generative image and video models
Apply AI tools to generate creative media content
Evaluate and compare generative models for different use cases

courses.title: Speech Recognition & Voice Synthesis
courses.subtitle: From audio input to AI-generated voice
courses.description: This course explores speech-to-text and text-to-speech technologies using Whisper, Deepgram, and ElevenLabs for audio interaction with AI systems.
learning_outcomes: Implement basic speech recognition pipelines
Utilize AI tools for realistic voice synthesis
Understand use cases of TTS/STT systems in AI applications

courses.title: Generative Design & UX with AI
courses.subtitle: Automating UI/UX design with AI capabilities
courses.description: Learn how to automate the design of user interfaces and flows using generative AI tools and prompt-based systems.
learning_outcomes: Use AI to create wireframes and mockups
Design user journeys with the help of generative AI tools
Implement AI-assisted UX testing methodologies

courses.title: 3D Model Generation from Data
courses.subtitle: Creating dimensional objects from visual data using AI
courses.description: Hands-on exploration of photogrammetry and 3D generation techniques using AI tools like NeRF and 3DFY.
learning_outcomes: Construct 3D objects from 2D images
Use AI-based tools for model rendering and refinement
Prepare data for photogrammetric workflows

courses.title: AI in Innovation Management
courses.subtitle: Using AI to drive strategic innovation
courses.description: Learn to identify market trends and utilize AI tools for innovation planning and KPI modeling.
learning_outcomes: Detect emerging market opportunities using AI tools
Apply AI-assisted planning methodologies
Model and monitor KPIs for innovation outcomes

courses.title: AI Product Management
courses.subtitle: Managing AI-driven product lifecycles
courses.description: Covers AI tool integration in product lifecycles, agile scoping, and team coordination.
learning_outcomes: Understand lifecycle planning for AI products
Integrate AI tools into product workflows
Coordinate teams using agile methodology

courses.title: AI-Enhanced Customer Support Systems
courses.subtitle: Revolutionizing support systems with AI
courses.description: Design and implement intelligent customer support using chatbots and automated tools.
learning_outcomes: Build AI-based chat and help desk systems
Understand CRM system integration with AI
Automate ticketing and support workflows

courses.title: Startup Incubation with AI
courses.subtitle: From idea to MVP using AI tools
courses.description: Students build a startup MVP leveraging AI solutions, prepare investor pitches, and explore funding readiness.
learning_outcomes: Develop MVPs using AI tools
Create AI-based business models and pitch decks
Navigate startup incubation and funding landscapes

courses.title: Mastering AI Developer Tools
courses.subtitle: VS Code, GitHub Actions, Docker and CI/CD pipelines
courses.description: Hands-on workshop for setting up AI development environments using popular tools and integrating CI/CD practices.
learning_outcomes: Configure VS Code for AI development
Integrate GitHub Actions for automation
Use Docker for environment management
Apply CI/CD principles to ML workflows

courses.title: AI on the Cloud
courses.subtitle: Deploying AI Models to AWS, Azure, and GCP
courses.description: Learn how to deploy machine learning models on major cloud platforms and utilize edge computing capabilities.
learning_outcomes: Deploy models on AWS, Azure, and GCP
Understand edge computing for AI
Manage cloud resources for ML projects

courses.title: Automation Platforms: Make, Zapier, n8n
courses.subtitle: Integrating AI with automation workflows
courses.description: Explore how AI can be used in conjunction with no-code and low-code automation platforms for business and technical workflows.
learning_outcomes: Use Make, Zapier, and n8n to build automation
Integrate AI into business process flows
Automate repetitive AI-enabled tasks

courses.title: AI for Documentation & Knowledge Systems
courses.subtitle: Using AI to create, manage, and access knowledge
courses.description: Study how AI can improve documentation workflows and develop intelligent knowledge systems with RAG, bots, and indexing.
learning_outcomes: Build RAG-powered documentation systems
Use AI for indexing and retrieval
Design bots to support knowledge access

courses.title: Advanced Data Structures for AI Applications
courses.subtitle: Efficient use of trees, graphs, hash maps, and vectors in AI systems
courses.description: Explores data structures tailored for AI applications, focusing on performance and optimization.
learning_outcomes: Apply complex data structures in AI pipelines
Optimize AI performance through structural choices
Evaluate storage and retrieval strategies

courses.title: Database Systems for AI & Big Data
courses.subtitle: From traditional SQL to cutting-edge vector databases
courses.description: Covers databases essential for AI, including relational, NoSQL, time-series, and vector DBs.
learning_outcomes: Design database systems tailored for AI applications
Compare SQL, NoSQL, and graph databases
Integrate vector databases like Pinecone and ChromaDB

courses.title: Data Engineering in Practice
courses.subtitle: Building pipelines for AI systems
courses.description: Hands-on training in building robust ETL pipelines, data lakes, and model-ready datasets.
learning_outcomes: Build scalable ETL workflows using Airflow and dbt
Model data for efficient ML usage
Deploy Delta Lake and other data lake frameworks

courses.title: Unstructured Data Management
courses.subtitle: AI-ready storage and processing for text, images, audio, and video
courses.description: Teaches techniques for managing unstructured formats in AI workflows.
learning_outcomes: Store and retrieve unstructured data effectively
Process media types for AI analysis
Evaluate cloud and local storage strategies

courses.title: AI-Powered Data Cleaning & Annotation
courses.subtitle: Automated preprocessing and labeling with AI
courses.description: Explores AI-assisted approaches to data labeling, noise reduction, and preprocessing pipelines.
learning_outcomes: Apply AI tools for data annotation
Reduce data noise with automated filters
Implement labeling pipelines at scale
